Text.Value: Ah! You look like someone who can probably read.

EditorData.NodeContext: nervous sales attempt, trying to sound confident. Oblivious to how insulting this sounds

Text.Value: SELL YOUR WARES LOUDER, LITTLE FRIEND! TRY SHOUTING!
Um... no, it's okay. I don't think Mr Needle would like that very much. We're not supposed to, um, deface the merchandise.

EditorData.NodeContext: Trying to politely refuse, finiding it hard to say no to an adult. 'Deface' is an unfamiliar word, Silfy's quoting Mr. Needle without knowing exactly what it means

Text.Value: Oh, sweet child. That rag isn't worth the paper it's printed on. It's full of lies.
I'm new, that's all. I just need to p-practice.
How about I sell you a copy, and then you can draw on it all you want? ([GEN_CheckMagicPocketGold_6057ad05-9492-4630-9f0a-be548b134c54])
Thank you! My first sale! I can't wait to tell Mol.
It's, um, relative. Doesn't mean it's not worth reading. So what do you say - buy a copy? ([GEN_CheckMagicPocketGold_6057ad05-9492-4630-9f0a-be548b134c54])

EditorData.NodeContext: Hesitantly using an adult phrase she's picked up somewhere

Text.Value: So, how's about buying a copy of today's edition? ([GEN_CheckMagicPocketGold_6057ad05-9492-4630-9f0a-be548b134c54])

EditorData.NodeContext: Adopting an awkward sales voice - slightly too loud

Text.Value: Oh, um, she's very busy. I think she's made new f-friends in the city.
How about it? I've got a copy of the Gazette with your name on it... ([GEN_CheckMagicPocketGold_6057ad05-9492-4630-9f0a-be548b134c54])
Um... Okay... CAN I INTEREST YOU IN A C-COPY OF THE BALDUR'S MOUTH GAZETTE? ...Ple- PLEASE?

EditorData.NodeContext: shouting, but uncomfortable with doing so

Text.Value: Not the best salesperson, are you?
I'll take one. ([GEN_CheckMagicPocketGold_6057ad05-9492-4630-9f0a-be548b134c54])
I wouldn't be caught dead reading that useless rag.
Want to buy another one? Today's is particularly legible. ([GEN_CheckMagicPocketGold_6057ad05-9492-4630-9f0a-be548b134c54])
Not interested. Now bugger off.
Oh. Well, um... I'll be sure to pass on your comments to the editor.
It's a really good paper, though. No spelling mistakes in it or anything!

EditorData.NodeContext: Desperately trying to make a sale

Text.Value: Can I interest you in, um, a copy of the Baldur's Mouth Gazette? Please buy one... ([GEN_CheckMagicPocketGold_6057ad05-9492-4630-9f0a-be548b134c54])

EditorData.NodeContext: Trying to sound confident, but a bit desperate at the end

Text.Value: Another time, perhaps.
Buy a copy. ([GEN_CheckMagicPocketGold_6057ad05-9492-4630-9f0a-be548b134c54])
It is? Oh, well... um... the truth depends on who you ask, doesn't it?

EditorData.NodeContext: Momentarily thrown/confused - this never occurred to her

Text.Value: I'm going to join her there when the gates open.
Perhaps later.
I - I can't. I'm supposed to stand here. You don't have to buy one.
Changed your mind? Go on - buy a Gazette. ([GEN_CheckMagicPocketGold_6057ad05-9492-4630-9f0a-be548b134c54])

EditorData.logicalname: HASMET, AFTER LONG REST, DIDN'T BUY

Text.Value: You're selling broadsheets now, Silfy?
Come back tomorrow for the next edition.

EditorData.logicalname: HASMET, AFTER LONG REST, BOUGHT PAPER

Text.Value: Sorry, can't talk. I might miss my next customer.
Where's Mol? Did she make it to the city too?
Baldur's Mouth Gazette. For stories with, um, teeth? Buy a copy? ([GEN_CheckMagicPocketGold_6057ad05-9492-4630-9f0a-be548b134c54])

EditorData.NodeContext: nervous sales attempt, reciting a script
EditorData.logicalname: Hasmet, didn't buy - before Long Rest

Text.Value: Your sales technique's improving - I'll give you that.
The first sale was the hardest. Once I sold to you, I just kept going!

EditorData.logicalname: Player bought copy prior to long rest

Text.Value: If you don't like today's news, come back tomorrow. It changes every day!

EditorData.NodeContext: Growing confidence, Like she's amazed at the fact the news changes daily

Text.Value: Oh. C-come back again if you change your mind.
Oh, I'm just no good at shouting. I'll never sell this broadsheet.
N-nothing to it really. The secret is saying things very loudly.

EditorData.NodeContext: Pleased to have figured this out

Text.Value: There's a wonderful article about me in there. Would you like me to sign it?
Another sale! I think I'm getting the hang of this.
We're all doing our bit. Better than s-sitting around waiting for the gates to open.

Synopsis:
Interact with Silfy as the broadsheet seller near the Post House.
Small introduction + option to buy broadsheets.
